scripts.preview: node scripts/preview.js || node -e "require('http').createServer((req,res)=>{const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const p=path.join('site',decodeURIComponent(req.url.split('?')[0]||'/'));const f=fs.existsSync(p)&&fs.statSync(p).isDirectory()?path.join(p,'index.html'):p;fs.readFile(f,(e,b)=>{if(e){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not Found');}else{res.writeHead(200);res.end(b);}});}).listen(5173,()=>console.log('Preview http://localhost:5173'))"
